panels.description: The total replication lag per replication flow
panels.title: Replication Lag

panels.description:
Time it takes records to replicate from source to target cluster. The difference between the current moment and record timestamp when the record is committed to the target cluster. 

long latency = System.currentTimeMillis() - record.timestamp();
panels.title: Replication Latnecy

panels.description: The age of incoming source records when replicated to the target cluster. The difference between the current moment and record timestamp when the record is read by MirrorMaker.
panels.title: Record age
